(He probably did make some noise in the rafters, I didn't say he 
didn;t. Nobody bothered to come check it out. As for how I know what 
it looked like, It was giving off the signal to my scanners)

The security guns started firing right at TM3Vulois.

"Oh Crap! Well, time to test these babies out."

He TF'd to Robot Mode after hiding behind one of Scorponok's boxes. 
He pulls out his two blasters, nwo fully chraged with two firing 
spots. He lpt from behind the box and fired right at the guns, 
destroying them.

"That was easy, but Battera will be here soon! I've got to go. Vulis 
jumps back into the rafters.
